title: NEUTRONIC ANALYSIS FOR NUCLEAR REACTOR SYSTEMS
description: Author: Bahman Zohuri Edition: 1st ed. 2017 edition Publication Date: November 3, 2016 Publisher: Springer ISBN-10: 3319429620 ISBN-13: 978-3319429625 Pages: 551 pages Format: pdf Size: 9.8M --- This book covers the entire spectrum of the science and technology of nuclear reactor systems, from underlying physics, to next generation system applications and beyond. Beginning with neutron physics background and modeling of transport and diffusion, this self-contained learning tool progresses step-by-step to discussions of reactor kinetics, dynamics, and stability that will be invaluable to anyone with a college-level mathematics background wishing to develop an understanding of nuclear power. From fuels and reactions to full systems and plants, the author provides a clear picture of how nuclear energy works, how it can be optimized for safety and efficiency, and why it is important to the future. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/neutronic-analysis-for-nuclear-reactor-systems/
